#include <stdio.h>
#include <string>
#include <algorithm>
#include <string.h>
using namespace std;

int memo[101][101][101];

int art[100],ar[100],col[100],h=0,k;
int mem(int a, int b, int C)
{  
   if(a>b) return 0;
   if(  memo[a][b][C]!=-1 ) return memo[a][b][C];   
   if(a==b) return max(0,k-C);
   int res=max(0,k-C)+mem(a+1,b,ar[a+1]);      
   for(int r=a+1;r<=b;r++)
     if(col[r]==col[a])
      res=min( res, mem(  a+1,r-1,ar[a+1] )+ mem(  r,b,C+ar[r] ) );
   return memo[a][b][C]=res;
}

int main()
{
    int n;
    memset(memo,-1,sizeof(memo));
    scanf("%d%d",&n,&k);
    for(int r=0;r<n;r++)scanf("%d",&art[r]);
    for(int r=0;r<n;r++)
    {
       int cont=0;
       int a=r;
       while(a<n && art[a]==art[r]) a++,cont++;
       ar[h]=cont;
       col[h++]=art[r];
       r=a-1;
    }    
    printf("%d\n",mem(0,h-1,ar[0]));
    return 0;
}
